name: Friends (The SDB)
description:
Friends is a local multiplayer game.

Instructions for playing:

Movement

Player1 - Arrows

Player2 - ASWD

Be careful of colors. You can only be on your color. For example: player1 is yellow color so it can't be on purple ground and player2 is purple so it can't be on yellow ground.

You can be on the head of other player if necessary. 

If you are in the head of other player, while jumping you both have to jump.
